Name: Vaccine Delivery Simulator
About the game: Vaccine Delivery Simulator is a fun challenging game. You must manage to deliver the vaccine to the infected. Your accuracy is important! Most of the game, you'll be throwing the vaccine A virus has invaded the world and it is you who must help defeat it! You Bogdan Kowalski are a courier and a brave altruist. Your partner Carl - the helicopter pilot, takes you to the platforms. After disembarking, you need to find the infected person and have time to deliver the vaccine as soon as possible. You will be delivering the vaccine in different ways , but most of the game you will throw the vaccine, so your accuracy is important! Each platform is unique, use the environment to your advantage! Key features: fun different modes dozens of unique levels many game mechanics bosses cutscenes secret badges scattered across the level musical instrument 'BIBAS-ATAS' beautiful graphics amazing music in SCI-FI style
